name: David Bang

projects.title: General Planetary Orbits
projects.description: As a physics research assistant, I converted old applets that ran on Flash into ones that used vanilla JavaScript

services.title: UX/UI Design
services.description: Proficient in wireframing in Figma, as well as conducting user surveys and creating user stories

services.title: Data Visualization
services.description: Proficient in Material UI tables, d3.js charts, and Tableau

services.title: Search Engine Optimization
services.description: Getting your website shown at the top of search results

aboutpara: My name is David Bang, I believe in realizing the best version of myself and helping others do the same.  I love working with talented teams to bring a vision to life! I have experience with owning small businesses and know that quality is most important when bringing value to companies.

resume.description: Well-versed with React, Typescript, Javascript, and Express.

experiences.bullets: Built a data visualization tool using Next.js and Typescript with data pulled from OpenSearch and Neo4j for analysts to catch cyber-criminals, Improved a static website to save and display back-end data by adding a Redux store with ReactJS

Created 25+ key components for processing and visualizing supply chain data using ReactJS, Led the effort for integrating prototype into a React Bootstrap template and integrated Okta for a market-ready product
Utilized Ansible to automate the installation of antivirus software
Updated old applets from Flash to JavaScript for Physics Professor Michael Fowler

education.universityPara: Bachelor of Arts in Computer Science
